page.title: 21Bishop Lovett Middle School October 2011
page.content:
Bishop Lovett (Church of England) Middle School closed just three months ago on 21 July 2011.

However, the school buildings, playing fields and extensive grounds that it vacated are now being used as a primary school (i.e. for children aged 4 to 11).

All "middle" schools on the Isle of Wight closed in July 2011 as the school system was changed from a 3 tier system (of primary schools, middle schools, and high schools) to a 2 tier system (primary schools and colleges/acadamies). The 3 tier system ended with the end of the school year in July 2011; the new 2 tier system started with the new school year in September 2011.
